Package utils

Class TraceBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.TraceBuffer

  • public class TraceBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects that represent a buffer for tracing and logging messages.

                              int recurseDepth,

        Method to add a logging message to the buffer.
        Parameters:
        property - the property the log is intended for

        recurseDepth - the depth of the recursion
